text: Thanks to everyone's feedback here. Please know that this was a collective decision from multiple people working on this initiative whose gender is underrepresented in the Julia community, and the choice to use "underrepresented genders" came with the sole purpose of welcoming to _all_ underrepresented genders. The call is happening today and I will try and bring up the question on the language we used -- hopefully things will only get better for next time.

underrepresented genders. The call is happening today and I will try and bring up the question on the language we used -- hopefully things will only get better for next time.

text: I think it's really great to have people that represent the group we're trying to reach out to make the decision. Not sure if the bikeshedding by all the men in the channel ends up being helpful or not, but I for one am 100% on board with whatever the group comes up with / decides
